sentences.en: New businesses may qualify for tax remission.
sentences.cn: 新的企业可以有资格享受税收减免。

sentences.en: The patient has been in remission for the past six months.
sentences.cn: 在过去的六个月中，病人的病情已经有所缓解。

sentences.en: There is a partial remission of fees for overseas students.
sentences.cn: 对留学生可以减免部分费用。
